meanings.def: the scientific study of the mind and how it influences behaviour
examples: Kevin has a masters degree in psychology.
She's a professor of psychology at Harvard University.

meanings.def: the kind of mind that somebody has that makes them think or behave in a particular way
examples: psychology of somebody the psychology of small boys
I help the actors understand the psychology of their characters.
The answers we give will reflect our own psychology.
Watching the shoppers at the sales gave her a first-hand insight into crowd psychology.

meanings.def: how the mind influences behaviour in a particular area of life
examples: psychology of something the psychology of interpersonal relationships
